text: visvasavantayini! obata pera dharmaya laba dun ayagenda, pratiksepa karannangenda, kavurun obage dharmaya samaccalayak vasayenda, (puhu) keliyak vasayenda Ã¦ra gannoda, ovunva (obata) sahayayan vasayen (ho araksakayin vasayen ho) noganu. oba (satya) visvasavantayin vasayen sitinnehu nam, allahtama biya vi (katayutu) karanu. (movungen kisivekutat biya novanu)
